posts.post_content:
I went way over budget on a recent purchase, so I need to unload this nice lot.  I would love to only mail one package, so I will try for a day or so to sell as a lot.  If no takers, I will sell individually.  All cards sold or pending.  

The cards are priced individual now.  Free shipping. All cards sold or pending.  Thanks.




Thanks.  Mike [url]vintagecpa@yahoo.com[/url].
